Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Mueller report did not establish whether Michael Flynn was lying or not.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that the Mueller group said Michael Flynn was lying.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support for the assertion that the FBI said Michael Flynn wasn't lying.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that if the FBI said Michael Flynn wasn't lying, then he must not have been lying.
Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations for why Michael Flynn went through what he did, other than the assertion made in the claim.
